Package net.chocomint.math.matrix

Class ComputableMatrix<T,M extends ComputableMatrix<T,?>>

java.lang.Object
net.chocomint.math.matrix.BasicMatrix<T,M>
net.chocomint.math.matrix.ComputableMatrix<T,M>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of stored data
M - the implemented matrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBase<M>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComplexMatrix, Matrix
public abstract class ComputableMatrix<T,M extends ComputableMatrix<T,?>> extends BasicMatrix<T,M> implements IBase<M>
The ComputableMatrix extends BasicMatrix and implements IBase
